title: [Melbourne Cup 1944]
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945 - Australia
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Soldiers - Australia
abstract: Australian Troops are delivered the excitement of the Melbourne Cup during World War II.
description: Under joint arrangement between the RAAF and Army Amenities Service, Newsreel Film of the running of the 1944 Melbourne Cup was rushed from the racecourse via Sydney to Northern Battle Stations. VX117252 Captain George Harvey Nicholson, OC Military History Field Team, seated at table.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002446; Australian War Memorial; Active; 2011
